page.title: 19The Old People
page.content: There seem to be a lot of old people about. The Acreage is a block of dwellings for old people. There is a warden who can keep an eye on them just in case they have problems. Most old people live in their own houses, many alone & of course they prefer it that way. Meals are cooked at the school several times a week and taken round by the "Meals on Wheels" volunteers to those who cannot manage for themselves. The visiting Chiropidist, Doctors' Surgery and Physiotherapy at Watlington hospital can all be very important. We could all be more aware of the often simple things that would make the life of the aged fuller, like just visiting or running errands.
